Project Description
XmlCodeEditor is a Silverlight 4 control based on RichTextControl that creates coloring and intellisense similar to the one in Visual Studio for editing MVC Views.

The project is still under development. The intellisense is not yet hooked up.

Demo: http://www.bodurov.com/XmlEditor/


Use as:

<UserControl 
    ...
    xmlns:XmlCodeEditor="clr-namespace:com.bodurov.SilverlightControls.XmlCodeEditor;assembly=com.bodurov.SilverlightControls.XmlCodeEditor">

    <Grid x:Name="LayoutRoot">
        <XmlCodeEditor:XmlCodeEditorBox x:Name="CodeEditor" Height="450"  TextWrapping="NoWrap"></XmlCodeEditor:XmlCodeEditorBox>
    </Grid>
</UserControl>
